title: Why Bitcoin Traders Are Eyeing This Week's Upcoming US Inflation Print
contentSnippet: Bitcoin traders are bracing for fresh U.S. inflation data that could steer Federal Reserve policy and dictate the market’s next major move.

title: Coinbase Ends Acquisition Talks for U.K.-Based BVNK: Fortune
contentSnippet: The negotiations, which began earlier this year and progressed to an exclusivity agreement in October, were expected to value BVNK between $1.5 billion and $2.5 billion.

title: Dogecoin Near Make-or-Break Zone as Fresh Bitcoin Slide Pulls Down Majors by 5%
JPMorgan Rolls Out JPM Coin Leveraging Coinbase's Base: Report
contentSnippet: Unlike stablecoins, deposit tokens are digital claims on existing bank funds and can be interest-bearing, offering a new option for institutional investors.

title: XRP Faces Bearish Cross Risk, Sinks 5% Even as ETFs Move Further
contentSnippet: The token's ability to defend the $2.39–$2.41 range will determine if it rebounds or faces further declines.

title: 「仮想通貨は正当なポートフォリオ分散手段」　機関投資家のアプローチに大きな変化＝シグナム
contentSnippet: スイスのデジタル資産銀行シグナムが発表した最新調査で、回答した世界の機関投資家の89%が仮想通貨をすでに保有し、仮想通貨を投機ではなくポートフォリオの有効な分散投資手段とみなしていることが明らかになった。

title: 米上場ターボ・エナジー、ステラ・タウラスと提携　スペインで再エネ融資をトークン化
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のターボ・エナジーがタウラス、ステラと提携し、スペインでクリーンエネルギー融資のトークン化実証実験を開始。ブロックチェーン活用で744億ドル規模のEaaS市場参入を目指す。

title: JPモルガンとDBS、トークン化預金の相互運用で取り組み
contentSnippet: JPモルガンとDBS銀行がトークン化預金の相互運用性フレームワーク開発に取り組んでいると発表した。KinexysとDBSトークンサービス間でリアルタイム決済の実現を目指す。

title: Bitcoin JapanのCEO、ビットコイン準備金基盤のAIインフラ投資計画など明かす
contentSnippet: エネルギー軸でビットコインとAIを融合BitcoinJapan株式会社（旧堀田丸正）は11日、臨時株主総会で商号変更を完了し、ビットコイン財務戦略の詳細を発表した。関連：堀田丸正、「BitcoinJapan株式会社」への商号変更と新経営陣を...

title: ソフトバンクG、エヌビディア株を9000億円で全売却、オープンAI投資へシフト
contentSnippet: 日本のソフトバンクグループが保有のエヌビディア株を全売却し、オープンAIへの最大400億ドル投資に充てる。ビジョンファンドは234億ドルの投資利益を計上し、純利益は前年比2倍以上となった。

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Bitcoin ETFs Pull In $300M as Traders Rush to Buy the Dip
contentSnippet: After two weeks of heavy redemptions, U.S.-listed spot Bitcoin ETFs turned positive again, led by Fidelity and Ark, even as global fund flows remain uneven.

title: XRP現物ETF、今週中に米国で上場見込みか　最終書類提出＝専門家
contentSnippet: カナリー・キャピタルがXRP現物ETFのナスダック上場に向けた8-Aフォームを提出した。専門家は明日か木曜日のローンチを示唆しており、米国で2つ目のXRP追跡ETFとなる見込みだ。

title: Canary XRP ETF Likely to Start Trading This Week After SEC Filing
contentSnippet: The fund could begin trading as early as Thursday.

title: ビットコイン量子コンピュータ対策で議論白熱に、アドレス移行提案の是非めぐり
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ビットコインの量子コンピュータ対策として、Taprootアドレスからの移行が提案され議論が起こった。量子耐性の獲得方法で専門家の見解が分かれている。

title: 7年ぶりの米国ICO「モナド」、トークンセール開示文書を公開　評価額3800億円弱
contentSnippet: モナド財団が11日、MONトークンのコインベース公開販売に関する開示文書を発表。FDV約3,750億円、最大75億トークンを販売。大口集中を防ぐ「ボトムアップ方式」を採用し、11月17日から販売開始。

title: ソラナ現物ETF、取引開始から10日間連続で資金が純流入
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ソラナの現物ETFは10日時点で、取引開始から10日間連続で資金が純流入。この状況について、事前の予想を上回っているとの見方が上がった。

title: Bitcoin Miners Must Own Power—or Die Trying Before Next Halving, MARA CEO Says
contentSnippet: With block rewards set to plunge, only miners with energy control or AI pivots are likely to survive, Thiel argues.

title: User Revolt Erupts on X as Character AI Quit Posts Go Viral
contentSnippet: User defections from Character.AI surged after a viral screenshot highlighted the app’s emotionally charged account-deletion prompt.

title: スタンダードチャータード、シンガポールでステーブルコイン決済カード「デカード」を支援
contentSnippet: スタンダードチャータードがDCSカードセンターと提携し、ステーブルコインを実店舗で使用できるクレジットカード「デカード」の主要銀行パートナーとなった。

title: Pro-XRP Lawyer John Deaton Is Running for Senate in Massachusetts—Again
contentSnippet: Crypto-focused lawyer John Deaton is taking on Democrat Ed Markey after losing by 20 points to industry foil Elizabeth Warren last year.

title: Bitcoin User Pays Over $105,000 in BTC to Send Just $10
contentSnippet: One expert called the event a "non-standard way of crafting a transaction."

title: Ethereum Is ‘The Infrastructure’ for Wall Street, Says Former BlackRock Executive
contentSnippet: Joseph Chalom is betting his next act on Ethereum, calling it the only chain institutions can trust to digitize finance.

title: Coinbase Abandons $2 Billion Acquisition of Stablecoin Firm BVNK: Fortune
contentSnippet: American crypto exchange Coinbase has scrapped plans to acquire stablecoin firm BVNK, according to a report Tuesday.

title: MegaETH Revokes $1 Million Token Sale Allotment After Influencer Posts Trading Plans
contentSnippet: Crypto influencer IcoBeast had their $1 million MEGA token allocation revoked due to a social media post about hedging their bag.

title: Elon Musk and Novelist Joyce Carol Oates Clash in Viral X Spat Over Meaning and Money
contentSnippet: A viral clash between novelist Joyce Carol Oates and Elon Musk over “soul” in the algorithmic age became a referendum on empathy, ego, and what it means to be human.

title: SoFi Rolls Out Crypto Trading With Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana and More
contentSnippet: Financial services firm SoFi is rolling out access to crypto trading, allowing users to buy and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other assets.

title: Monad v MegaETH, Shutdown Fakeout, UNI Switch!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors are trading in the red after an overnight dip, with Bitcoin (BTC) down 1% at $104,800, Ethereum (ETH) down 1% at $3,550, Binance Coin (BNB) down 2% at $978, and Solana (SOL) down 3% at $

title: HBAR Declines 2.1% to $0.183 as Volume Spike Signals Technical Breakdown
contentSnippet: Price action retreats from resistance as institutional selling emerges at key levels.

title: Bitcoin Slips Toward $103K; Miners Tumble on AI Trade Cooling, SoftBank's Nvidia Exit
contentSnippet: Crypto traders are taking profits on the bounce in prices, a Wintermute strategist said in a note.

title: Toncoin Drops to Key $2.07 Support Level as Selling Pressure Builds
contentSnippet: The token briefly rose to $2.16 before reversing, with high trading volume indicating strong resistance at that level.
